Reviews.Title: Great Phone!
Reviews.Author: S. Medel "Foxy"
Reviews.Content: I have had this phone for 2 years and it is still working just like new! I love the purple color which is what attracted me to get this phone, I never lose calls and love that I can put time on it myself instead of having a monthly phone bill.  I like that you can two way call on it for only $1 and can use it all day like a walkie talkie, I like that it has speaker phone as well for when your busy and can't be holding the phone to your ear. Texting on it is a bit difficult but it works and I recommend this Motorola i776w cell phone.

Reviews.Title: This phone sucks!
Reviews.Author: C. Mota
Reviews.Content: I had this phone for a little over three months, just in time for the warranty to run out, and I got the blue screen of death. The phone would shut off on its own, wouldn't text, receive calls, or even come on. If I was lucky enough to turn it on, all I got was that blue screen. This phone is garbage. Stay away!!

Reviews.Title: Joyce-Roscommon, Mich.
Reviews.Author: Joyce  Emery
Reviews.Content: I am very pleased with my recent purchase. Amazon came thru as scheduled. Keep up the good work Amazon.I Love my new phone.
